name: Space Chasers
description:
The Point of the game is to avoid the small missiles that will follow you around the screen for as long as possible.

Every 10 seconds a new missile will spawn and follow you while you increase in size making it harder to avoid the missiles. 

Have fun and don't die!


ActionsGameShellComputerMovementD-PadArrow KeysPause / Play GameStart ButtonEnter KeyQuit GameMenu ButtonEsc KeyRestart Game
